group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]So, let me see if I have this straight.
[fontSize:20]You made a contract with Kyubey in@a future that we're not aware of...
[fontSize:20]And then time rewound, so you've@had to start all over again?
[fontSize:20]A type of magic that controls time...@Is that really possible?

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]The power of magic is to make@impossible miracles a reality.
[fontSize:20]I also don't have any recollection@of making a contract with you.
[fontSize:20]So if it's true that you made a@contract with me in the future...
[fontSize:20]It explains your status as an irregularity.

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]For instance, what if her wish when@making the contract was something like...

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]I understand... I guess it's hard to@believe a story like that right away, huh?

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]I'm sorry. It's just important to think@about all the different possibilities.

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Can you two come along@with me after school?
[fontSize:20]I'll show you proof that@I came from the future!
